summary:
Profile: executive and non-executive, strategic thinker, people-oriented, reflective, result-driven
Specialties: corporate strategy, transformation, ESG, corporate development, mergers and acquisitions, corporate finance, venturing, boardroom dynamic, valuation, renewable energy, power, utilities, waste, Netherlands, Germany

treasury_media.title: Boer & Croon on LinkedIn: Hans Bongartz gestart bij Boer & Croon | Boer & Croon
treasury_media.description: Vanaf 1 december ben ik gestart bij Boer&Croon: ik zal gaan bijdragen aan het ontwikkelen van onze solution Strategie&Transformatie en de uitbouw van consultancy binnen Boer&Croon. De energietransitie en ESG zullen ook in het hart van mijn praktijk blijven.

treasury_media.title: Kernkompetenzen für Erfolg im Job: »Programmieren zu können wird in Zukunft weniger wichtig«
treasury_media.description: In my LichtBlick Board period I was interviewed by Der Spiegel regarding the searched-after competences for recruits in the challenging German labor market.

treasury_media.title: Psychodynamica in de relatie tussen de private equity investeerder en investee
treasury_media.description:
Mijn Insead thesis (2015) is destijds op de website van M&A gefeatured. Korte samenvatting: 
Psychologisch onderzoek naar de relatie tussen PE investeerders en buyout managers suggereert oorzaken voor de systematische weerstand bij Private Equity om pre-deal gericht onderzoek te doen naar ‘human capital’ aspecten van een mogelijke investering.

education.field_of_study: EMC (Executive Master in Change), Organisational Psychology & Leadership

publications.name: Insead thesis: Psychodynamics in the investor - investee relationship. Private Equity's resistance to opening Pandora's Box on human capital

profile_positions.description:
As of December 1 2022, I have joined Boer&Croon as a partner in the Strategy&Transformation Group. I am looking forward to working with my colleagues on the development and implementation of strategies for complex management topics and realization of corporate transformations and objectives. 

From my background in the energy sector, with my consulting experience and network in Dutch industry I hope to contribute to the development of Boer&Croon´s Strategy&Transformation solution and expansion of our consultancy ambitions. Also, I will stay focused on the energy transition and ESG. 

Please also refer to the short profile article on Boer&Croon´s website: 

https://www.linkedin.com/posts/boer-%26-croon_hans-bongartz-gestart-bij-boer-croon-activity-7004430777257975808-RS9n/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop
profile_positions.title: Partner Strategy&Transformation at Boer&Croon

profile_positions.description: As of Sept 27th I was appointed member of the Supervisory Counsil of Marres, House for Contemporary Culture in Maastricht (www.marres.org).
profile_positions.title: Lid Raad van Toezicht Marres, Huis voor hedendaagse cultuur

profile_positions.description:
Very pleased to announce the next step in my career: as of May 1, 2020, I will be Managing Director in the Board of Management of LichtBlick SE (https://www.lichtblick.de), a 100% Eneco entity. After the recent (30/4/2020) acquisition of the E.on Heizstrom portfolio of 350k contracts, LichtBlick is now the nr. 5 energy supplier in the German market. (https://www.lichtblick.de/presse/news/2020/04/29/kartellamt-und-eu-genehmigen-transaktion-heizstrom-geschäft-von-e-on-geht-an-lichtblick/)

Working from Hamburg, my colleagues in the Board and I will be leading LichtBlick into the exciting new phase of the company's future. Our vision is that LichtBlick will be the best-known and best-loved brand for a climate friendly and sustainable lifestyle. 

Having been on the LichtBlick Supervisory Board for two and a half year, I am really pleased to switch to the executive role now. Among my tasks will be the growth agenda: corporate development/M&A/partnerships and shareholder (Eneco-Mitsubishi) affairs, ao the cooperation with other Eneco portfolio companies in Germany. In addition: the Legal and People & Culture teams will report to me. 

Key projects for the coming years: 
- strengthening our ´strategic circle´ by hiring key director positions
- preparing for J-SOX / In control as required by Japanese stock exchange (a.o. professionalizing compliance, data privacy, risk frameworks and processes)
- defining a robust 5-year strategy for LichtBlick towards an integrated energy company (a.o. by creating an own asset base)
- incorporating the acquired E.on client portfolios
- introducing the full Hay methodology: describing all functions, creating a complete salary band systematic benchmarked with relevant peers, and a new benefits catalogue

I am truly excited and grateful that I was given this opportunity by the Eneco Board. Looking forward to be in Hamburg post-Corona and to a successful cooperation with my LichtBlick colleagues!
profile_positions.title: Managing Director (Geschäftsführung)

profile_positions.description:
At the Shareholders Meeting of Dec 3d, 2019 I was installed as member of the Supervisory Board at Greenchoice (https://www.greenchoice.nl/over-ons/), in which Eneco holds a 30% stake.

In this manifesto on YouTube, Greenchoice shares the company's sustainable mission and vision (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVW7ck0XimI&feature=youtu.be)

Within the Board, I lead the strategy committee and am member of the Finance, Audit&Risk committee.

Update June 17, 2022: after 2.5 years, at the Shareholder´s Meeting of June 17th, I was succeeded as Supervisory Board member by Eneco's International CFO. This change was part of a governance restructuring at Greenchoice initiated by the Eneco Board in which also Eneco´s Shareholder role changed from Group COO to Eneco's Head of Legal.  

Looking back at a very dynamic and interesting period as part of the Greenchoice Supervisory Board, I am particularly pleased with the following results and developments:
- (together with co-Board member Michiel Rexwinkel and Eneco Legal), the design of amended articles of association facilitating the Business Chamber (Ondernemingskamer) remedies to be lifted in Dec 2019
- (together with co-Board member Michiel Rexwinkel), the set-up of a completely new Supervisory Board after the three OK (Ondernemingskamer) Board members jointly resigned early Q2 2020
- the CEO succession process leading to the successful hiring of Coen de Ruiter as Greenchoice CEO in 2021
- the redefinition and sharpening of Greenchoice´ strategy for 2002-2025 in which I assisted the management team as chair of the Strategy Committee 
- (as a full Supervisory Board) our assistance to the Management Team navigating successfully through the Covid challenges and further professionalizing the company
profile_positions.title: Member of the Supervisory Board (lid RvC)

profile_positions.description: Due to maternity leave of the new CEO (Leonie Baneke) at Eneco E-Mobility (EeM) I have on an a.i. basis taken over this position for the coming approx. 6 months. This has been an additional role next to my MD role at LichtBlick. Together with the EeM MT and teams in The Netherlands, Belgium and Germany we focused on delivering our budget and plan. Next to that, we have (re-)assessed our go-to-market strategy for the important and growing German e-mobility market.
profile_positions.title: a.i. CEO Eneco E-Mobility

profile_positions.description:
As of June 25th 2019 I have joined the Board of ONZO (http://onzo.com) as an Investor Board member and non-executive director. 

ONZO is breaking new ground in utility data analytics. By transforming big utility data into real insight, we help companies in the energy space understand how each customer uses energy on a personal level. This insight can then be leveraged to improve customer engagement, satisfaction and loyalty, while helping operational efficiency. We believe the energy sector works better when utilities and their customers work in unison. Through our insight, they can.

Through many consulting engagements with utility companies, ONZO has established a set of core needs that utilities will have to meet, in order to compete. Our product is being deployed to leading companies and some of the largest utilities in both the UK/EU. We are backed by leading Private Equity firms and our vision for the future is utterly gripping.

In relation to my new Board of Management role at LichtBlick in Hamburg as of 1/5/2020, I have stepped down from this role at ONZO.
profile_positions.title: Investor Board member and Non Executive Director

profile_positions.description:
Lichtblick (https://www.lichtblick.de) is the leading green energy retailer  in Germany, providing renewable  energy to over 645,000 customers. Eneco has acquired a 50% stake in LichtBlick end of Febr '17 and exercised the call option to acquire the remaining 50% end of Dec. 2018. As one of three Eneco representatives, on December 12, 2017 I have been installed as member of the Supervisory Board of Lichtblick Holding AG and the Administrative Board of Lichtblick SE.

In relation to my start as a member of the Board of Management of LichtBlick SE as of May 1, I stepped down from this Supervisory Board position.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Supervisory Board at Lichtblick Holding AG (lid Raad van Commissarissen)

profile_positions.description:
After 2 yrs and 10 months in the a.i. M&A lead role at Eneco, I am please to announce that starting September 2018  I have joined Eneco as the director of Corporate Development. My engagement with Eneco over the last years has been really interesting and rewarding. Together with many talented colleagues, in 2017 and 2018 I have been able to contribute to a significant growth of Eneco's client and asset base in the Netherlands, Germany and Belgium. 

Also given the important privatisation process ahead, it was a relatively easy decision for me to leave my independent advisory role, fully commit to Eneco and dedicate to the next phase of the company's future. In my new role, I am looking forward to lead the M&A, Venturing and Strategic Partnership teams. Also, I am exited to be part of Eneco's newly formed Executive Committee.

As a last significant project in this role I am pleased that we were able to close the acquisition of the E.on  'Heizstrom' portfolio of approx. 350k electricity contracts. This acquisition places LichtBlick in the top-5 of German energy suppliers. Please also refer to the press release: https://www.lichtblick.de/presse/news/2020/04/29/kartellamt-und-eu-genehmigen-transaktion-heizstrom-geschäft-von-e-on-geht-an-lichtblick/

In relation to my new position as MD in LichtBlick SE's Board of Management starting May 1, 2020 and working from Hamburg, my portfolio as Eneco's Director of Corporate Development was split up and passed on to two Eneco-colleagues.
profile_positions.title: Director of Corporate Development and Venturing

profile_positions.description:
Early Feb. 2020 Eneco sold its 75% stake in Jedlix to the Management lead by CEO Serge Subiron. We are pleased that this sale was concluded in close cooperation with Renault who continues as strategic shareholder in Jedlix. In relation to our ending as a shareholder I have also stepped down as Chairman.

Please find below JedLix' press statement
https://jedlix.com/en/blog/jedlix-management-buy-out/
--------------
After 2 months as Supervisory Board member, as of November 2018 I have assumed the position of Chairman of the Supervisory Board of Jedlix (https://jedlix.com/nl). Jedlix is part of Eneco's Venturing portfolio and is co-owned with Groupe Renault who holds a 25% stake in the company. 

At Jedlix, we have made it our mission to ensure that all electric cars start using sustainable energy. We are helping by offering a smart way of electric charging! At home and in public, making every charging stop the best possible charging stop. In addition to getting financial rewards, you also help shut down obsolete gas and coal plants. This way, we can speed up the transition to sustainable energy, together with you and our partners:
profile_positions.title: Chairman Of The Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description:
De Vereniging Bedrijfscollecties Nederland (www.VBCN.nl) is een samenwerkingsverband van bedrijven, organisaties en instellingen die naast hun kernactiviteit (hedendaagse) kunst verzamelen.
De vereniging is een professioneel platform waar conservatoren en kunstadviseurs van bedrijfscollecties kennis en ervaring uitwisselen
profile_positions.title: Penningmeester
